results.title: Kung fu as a folk art
results.creator_credit: Ban Hoe, Pierre Stevens, Roland Pirker and ONF | NFB
results.brief_description: An art, a self-discipline, a martial skill, a philosophy, the ancient Chinese tradition of Kung Fu is all of these. This film follows a class of novices at a Canadian school of Kung Fu through to the completion of their three-year course.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ban Hoe, Pierre Stevens, Roland Pirker and ONF | NFB

results.title: Kumars at No. 42
results.creator_credit: Lissa Evans, Nick Wood, Richard Pinto, Sharat Sardana and BBC
results.brief_description: Cult television program “The Kumars at No. 42” was an instant success in native Britain. It revolves around a fictional immigrant family who have bulldozed their back garden so they can build a studio on the back of their house and indulge their spoilt only son, Sanjeev, who fancies himself as a celebrity chat show host. Each guest is subjected to a grilling from Sanjeev as well as his mother (Indira Joshi), father (Vincent Ebrahim) and Granny Sushila (Meera Syal). The comedy is quite outrageous as the guests frequently become overwhelmed by the absurd banter between the family and Sanjeev, who tries in vain to take command of his show. Guests include Michael Parkinson, Richard E. Grant, Fay Ripley, Minnie Driver, Garry Lineker, Mel B, Claire Sweeney, Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen, Ray Winstone, Richard & Judy, Lorraine Kelly, Stephen Fry and Lesley Garrett.

results.title: Kumak the sleepy hunter: a film based on an old Eskimo tale
results.creator_credit: Alma Duncan, Audrey McLaren, Dunclaren Productions and ONF | NFB
results.brief_description: An Inuit legend about a hunter who is too sleepy to hunt, told with puppets. Despite all efforts to change him he remains sleepy until the day when, following a great adventure, he attains success as a hunter. But then he foolishly tells the secret of his success to his nagging wife.

results.title: Kulu: the happy valley
results.creator_credit: R.L. Storey and Documentary Films of India
results.brief_description: Describes the once remote Kulu Valley in India, its people and their traditional customs and how the district is a hiker’s paradise and popular summer resort. The valley is a trading route for Mongolians with their pack animals, and fairs are major occasions. Pilgrims also make their way to this valley and its sacred temple.

results.title: Kryfto: give them a chance
results.creator_credit: Michael Palmer, Stanley Wright, Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees and Rank Screen Services
results.brief_description: A Greek refugee camp is shown through the eyes of children playing “kryfto” (hide and seek) in and out of the cubicles of a converted tobacco factory. The Greek government is trying to close the camp but homes and employment still have to be found for 400 people. We see one friendless old woman who is settled in a home, built to house old people from refugee camps all over Greece. Introduced with an appeal by HRH the Duke of Edinburgh.

results.title: KRO Germany
results.creator_credit: Crown Film Unit and Junge Film Union
results.brief_description: This film, which was produced by The British Central Office of Information for the Control Commission of the British zone of postwar Germany, shows the daily life of a Kreis Resident Officer (the Control Commission Officer in charge of a German Kreis or district). The KRO is seen dealing with the day-to-day difficulties which arise, showing how they are tackled, and what problems have yet to be solved.

results.title: Krakonos, the Mountain King and the Cobbler
results.brief_description: Animated puppet film concerning a cobbler’s wife who is saddened by the roguish antics of her husband. When the cobbler steals a goat and incurs the wrath of an angry farmer his wife appeals to Krakonos the Mountain King for help. Krakonos changes the cobbler into a scarecrow until he repents of his evil ways.

results.title: Krakonos and the ghost (K)
results.brief_description: Animated film with puppets. When the village is threatened by a mysterious ghost that robs those it frightens, Krakonos the Mountain King decides to investigate. Suspecting the ghost is phoney Krakonos lays a trap.

results.title: Krakonos and Matty the Glassman
results.brief_description: Animated puppet story about Matty, a poor glassmaker, who vows to marry his sweetheart Cordelia when he gains some money. On the way to the market Matty stops to drink with a friend and loses his wares. Angry at Matty for his recklessness, Cordelia calls on Krakonos the Mountain King to devise a test for Matty so he can prove his worth.

results.title: Krakonos and Marquardt the Governor
results.brief_description: Animated fairytale about a wicked father who locks his daughter Viola in a tower when she refuses to marry an old Count. Viola’s handsome suitor fails in his attempts to rescue her until Krakonos the Mountain King comes to the rescue.
